Workflow.Name: ReviewHub - Calculate FactMetricBoard Health Score All
Workflow.Description: The flow is intended to run once and calculate the health score for all scorecards on the Review Hub application. The flow is not scheduled so even if it's off there would be no impact as it has served its purpose.

LocalizedName.description: ReviewHub - Calculate FactMetricBoard Health Score All

Description.description: The flow is intended to run once and calculate the health score for all scorecards on the Review Hub application. The flow is not scheduled so even if it's off there would be no impact as it has served its purpose.
